Definition.WordDefinition: stooge n 1: a person of unquestioning obedience [syn: {flunky}, {flunkey}, {yes-man}] 2: a victim of ridicule or pranks [syn: {butt}, {goat}, {laughingstock}] v 1: cruise in slow or routine flights 2: act as the stooge; "His role was to stooge for the popular comedian" 3: act as a stooge, in a compliant or subordinate manner; "He stooged for the flamboyant Senator"
